post_title: FS: Ungraded T206 - NO LONGER FOR SALE
post_content:
Available for sale are the following cards (SEE MY OTHER POSTS FOR ADDITIONAL CARDS):

PORTRAITS:

T206 - Nap Rucker (Piedmont 150/25) 
T206 - Lee Quillen (Piedmont 350/25) 
T206 - George Stone (SC 150/30) 
T206 - Chief Meyers (SC 350-460/25) [LOW PSA POPULATION] 
T206 - Patsy Dougherty (Piedmont 150/25) [ADDED 8.11.24]

ACTION POSES:

T206 - Germany Schaefer (Piedmont 350-460/25)
T206 - Bill Clymer (Piedmont 350/25) 
T206 - Simon Nicholls (Piedmont 150/25) 
T206 - Cy Seymour (SC 150/30) 
T206 - Bill Clancy (SC 350/30) 
T206 - Ed Konetchy (Piedmont 150/25) 
T206 - Bill Shipke (Piedmont 35025) 
T206 - Bob Bescher (Piedmont 350-460/25) 
T206 - Mickey Doolan (Piedmont 350/25) - SOLD [ADDED 8.11.24]
T206 - Dode Criss (Piedmont 350/25) [ADDED 8.11.24]

Please add $5 for shipping.

If you want to purchase any card:

1. The first person to post "I'll take it" will get the card. This post will secure the card in front of anyone else who may be in communication with me regarding that card.
2. Email me at [url]jmanners51@gmail.com[/url] by putting the name of the card in the subject line and your address in the text.
3. Remit payment by PayPal (PPFF).
4. I don't have easy access to a Post Office so please allow up to 5 days for me to get to the Post Office to mail the card.
